channel.title: Hybrid PvP V3 Spawning HELP!
channel.description:
Hey. I'm an alright coder but i seem to be struggling to make so admins can do ::item... I've added this to top of code:
if (playerCommand.startsWith("item") && c.playerRights >= 3) { (Didn't work)
Original:
if (playerCommand.startsWith("item")) {
Heres the commands.java if u want to see whole thing. [url=http://uppit.com/jcxuc5z38wpl/Commands.java]http://uppit.com/jcxuc5z38wpl/Commands.java[/url] Please get back to me as soon as you can Thanks :D

item.title: Hybrid PvP V3 Spawning HELP!
item.dc:creator: @holo1113 holo1113
item.description:
@holo1113 wrote:

If that isnt working and its PI try putting the command under adminstrator commands…
like this
public void administratorCommands(Client c, String playerCommand)
{
if (playerCommand.startsWith(“item”)) {
try {
String[] args = playerCommand.split(" ");
if (args.length == 3) {
int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(args[1]);
int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(args[2]);
if ((newItemID <= 20500) && (newItemID >= 0)) {
c.getItems().addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);
} else {
c.sendMessage(“That item ID does not exist.”);
}
} else {
c.sendMessage(“Wrong usage: (Ex:(::pickup_ID_Amount)(::item 995 1))”);
}
} catch(Exception e) {

			}
			}

I am new at posting and i jsut started coding PI so gl with your problem lol =p and 3 on some servers is owner 2 is admin sometimes
